ISSUE.TITLE: The download button on the dashboard will redirect users to an invalid page.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary The download button on the dashboard will not download the file but redirect users to a weird page. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. I create a query and add this query to a dashboard. 2. Click the `Download as CSV File`. 3. Then I will be redirected to a page which shows `It seems like the page you're looking for cannot be found.` Any other info e.g. Why do you consider this to be a bug? What did you expect to happen instead? ### Technical details: * Redash Version: 9.0.0-alpha * Browser/OS: Chrome Version 79.0.3945.130 (Official Build) (64-bit) * How did you install Redash: on Kubernetes

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Query View redesign (#4536) Co-authored-by: Arik Fraimovich <arik@arikfr.com>
